title: "WHO deploys virtual assistant called Florence to help smokers quit"
excerpt: "As part of the World No Tobacco Day, the World Health Organization (WHO) has multiplied initiatives to fight against smoking. The dissemination of digital tools and exploitation of artificial intelligence are two of the aspects on which the WHO wishes to rely to fight against tobacco."
